messages.title: A choice between strong and stable leadership or a coalition of chaos

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Julian Brazier offers strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
A promise to deliver the Brexit that the British people voted for.
A commitment to keep the economy strong by controlling public finances and keeping taxes down.

issues.brexitEurope: Julian Brazier supports delivering the Brexit that the British people voted for.
issues.economy: To keep the economy strong, public finances should be controlled and taxes should be kept down.
issues.immigration: Plans to reduce and control immigration, to help the needs of the UK economy and relieve pressure on public services.

housing.content: A commitment to help young people own their own home, through schemes like Help to Buy.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet contains images of the candidate Julian Brazier with Theresa May, indicating support and association with the then Prime Minister of the UK.
